name: Seizure Disorder, Seizure Classification
description:
Partial -
Rhythmic jerking movements of the face, arm, or leg may stare into space
Remain motionless
Engage in repetitive behaviors ( facial grimacing, gesturing, chewing,
lip smacking, snapping fingers, repeating words or phrases, walking, running, or undressing)
Generalized / Tonic – Clonic
Scream or shriek
Appear cyanotic
Violent muscle jerking / appears stiff
Tongue biting
Frothing from mouth
Loss of bowel/bladder control
Loss of consciousness
